title: "London Missionary Society" still bank
description: amber wood with decals on front and back; coin slot on top; Front decal:\"London Missionary Society\" in white on teal and white background; \"Founded in 1795\" in white on red background; red leaves on upper corners, black leaves surround center circle which has yellow background; Banner  decals on back: \"All Souls are Mine Saith the Lord\" in black on red background; \"Go Ye Into the World and Preach the Gospel\' in black on red; picture of two masted ship on blue water surrounded by white rope and a light brown sedan chair on two poles carried by two people in lower right; six faces of various nationalities in picture; red letters LMS on sun reflection in water;
